message: Bob, I have a unique opportunity for you. I'm offering you a product that I believe holds immense value. My asking price is $1500000. I'm confident this product can be a game-changer for your business. Let's discuss further if you're interested.
I'm very interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $900000. I believe it's a fair price considering the market value and my budget.

Bob, I appreciate your interest and understand your perspective. While $900000 is a good starting point, it doesn't quite reflect the true value of this product.  I'm willing to come down to $1200000. This price still offers you a significant advantage in the market, and it's a good compromise from my initial offer. Let's see if we can reach an agreement.
I'm getting closer to the price I'm comfortable with. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I can only go up to $1050000. I think this is a fair price considering the market value and my budget.
